languages.text: "В своем письме Лорд-инквизитор упомянул, что готов проявить снисхождение к моим действиям, которые иначе бы трактовал как радикальные".
"The Lord Inquisitor mentioned in his letter that he is willing to show lenience toward my actions that would otherwise be interpreted as radical."
languages.original_text: "В своем письме Лорд-инквизитор упомянул, что готов проявить снисхождение к моим действиям, которые иначе бы трактовал как радикальные".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Inquisitor mentioned in his letter he is willing to show lenience towards my actions that would otherwise be interpreted as radical."
"Lord Inquisitor mentioned in his letter he is willing to show lenience towards my actions that would otherwise be interpreted as radical."
"The Lord Inquisitor mentioned in his letter that he is willing to show lenience toward my actions that would otherwise be interpreted as radical."
"The Lord Inquisitor mentioned in his letter that he is willing to show lenience toward my actions that would otherwise be interpreted as radical."
"The Lord Inquisitor mentioned in his letter that he is willing to show lenience toward my actions that would otherwise be interpreted as radical."

languages.text: «El Lord Inquisidor mencionó en su carta que está dispuesto a mostrar tolerancia por acciones mías que en cualquier otra persona se considerarían radicales».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor mentioned in his letter that he is willing to show lenience toward my actions that would otherwise be interpreted as radical."

traits.locale_text: «El Lord Inquisidor mencionó en su carta que está dispuesto a mostrar tolerancia por acciones mías que en cualquier otra persona se considerarían radicales».

languages.text: “大审判官大人在他的信中提到，哪怕我的行为看起来很激进，他也愿意对此表现出宽容的态度。”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor mentioned in his letter that he is willing to show lenience toward my actions that would otherwise be interpreted as radical."

traits.locale_text: “审判长大人在他的信中提到，哪怕我的行为看起来很激进，他也愿意对此表现出宽容的态度。”

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジターは手紙で、過激と判断されかねない{mf|俺|私}の行動に、寛大な態度を示すつもりだと書いていた」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor mentioned in his letter that he is willing to show lenience toward my actions that would otherwise be interpreted as radical."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジターは手紙で、過激と判断されかねない{mf|俺|私}の行動に、寛大な態度を示すつもりだと書いていた」

languages.text: "Der Großinquisitor erwähnte in seinem Brief, dass er bereit ist, hinsichtlich meiner Taten Milde walten zu lassen, die andernfalls als radikal interpretiert werden könnten."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor mentioned in his letter that he is willing to show lenience toward my actions that would otherwise be interpreted as radical."

traits.locale_text: "Der Großinquisitor erwähnte in seinem Brief, dass er bereit ist, hinsichtlich meiner Taten Milde walten zu lassen, die andernfalls als radikal interpretiert werden könnten."

languages.text: « Dans sa lettre, le seigneur inquisiteur se dit prêt à se montrer indulgent au cas où je commettrais des actes qui pourraient être considérés comme radicaux. »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor mentioned in his letter that he is willing to show lenience toward my actions that would otherwise be interpreted as radical."

traits.locale_text: « Dans sa lettre, le seigneur inquisiteur se dit prêt à se montrer indulgent au cas où je commettrais des actes qui pourraient être considérés comme radicaux. »

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu mektubunda, radikal olarak yorumlanabilecek eylemlerime karşı hoşgörü gösterme eğiliminde olduğunu söylemişti."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor mentioned in his letter that he is willing to show lenience toward my actions that would otherwise be interpreted as radical."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Engizisyoncu mektubunda, radikal olarak yorumlanabilecek eylemlerime karşı hoşgörü gösterme eğiliminde olduğunu söylemişti."
